verbs.description: bedwarf (third-person singular simple present bedwarfs, present participle bedwarfing, simple past and past participle bedwarfed)

entries.meaning: (archaic, transitive) To make a dwarf of; to stunt or hinder the growth of; to dwarf.
examples: Tis shrinking, not close weaving, that hath thus In mind and body both bedwarfed us.
